page.title: 20WORK & LEISURE IN ST.THOMAS.
page.content: {The County Ground}Is used for greyhound racing,speedway & rugby.The speedway takes place on mondays.It is very noisy when they are racing & the noise can be heard in most of St.Thomas.The team is called the Falcons. At St.Thomas church there is a scout group,& a guide group.The guides meet in the church hall & the brownies at cowick first school.There are many public houses in St.Thomas and many adults play skittles or darts.There are leagues & each public house enters a team.Also in St.Thomas there are night clubs & discos.On mondays & fridays children between 12 & 18 may go to the discos.There is also a karate club for all ages near the county ground.
